articles.title: Darth Vader figure disappears from Colston plinth in Bristol - Bristol Live
articles.description: The Star Wars character was placed on the plinth once occupied by a statue of slave trader Edward Colston
articles.content:
A figurine of Darth Vader which was put on the Edward Colston plinth has since disappeared.
The Star Wars figure appeared on the empty plinth overnight on Wednesday (December 2).
